channel.title: config on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in config on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Global site parameters On top of Hugo global configuration, the Relearn theme lets you define the following parameters in your config.toml (here, values are default). Note that some of these parameters are explained in details in other sections of this documentation. ​ params.toml # This is the file `config/_default/params.toml`. # You can also store the below options directly in your `hugo.toml` but then # need to contain them within the `params` key.
